content.text:
As of the last regulatory filing, the top institutional shareholders of SCHD stock are:
1. BlackRock Inc. - Holding approximately 10.56% of the total shares outstanding.
2. Wells Fargo & Company - Holding approximately 3.92% of the total shares outstanding.
3. Morgan Stanley - Holding approximately 2.85% of the total shares outstanding.
4. Bank of America Corporation - Holding approximately 2.81% of the total shares outstanding.
5. JPMorgan Chase & Co. - Holding approximately 2.75% of the total shares outstanding.

Insider ownership refers to the ownership stake that company executives, directors, and other insiders hold in a company's stock. As of the last available information, insiders hold approximately 0.15% of SCHD stock. The largest insider shareholder is Charles Schwab himself, the founder and chairman of Charles Schwab Corporation, which sponsors SCHD. He holds around 0.07% of the total shares outstanding.
